name: Starship (Maragato Entertainment) (Maragato Entertainment)
description:
In this epic adventure, a dreamy boat finds itself flying across space and time. Can you help it find the purpose of this unexpected journey?

Fly through 8 ever-increasing difficulty, while you try to upgrade your ship with different weapon combinations. Blast away against sorties, terrain enemies and bosses, avoiding being ambushed as you collect power ups to activate new weapons, secret tokens for hidden levels and extra lives through 8 plus 4 bonus stages of ever-increasing difficulty. Can you find all of the secrets and make it to the surprising end of this adventure?

Play with a gamepad or keyboard, in full screen or any window sizes. The game automatically pauses when minified and saves your progress on each level completion. Featuring endless gameplay with progressive levelling up. Includes many classical background tracks.
